Class Menu

java.lang.Object
Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Represents the Menu available in a restaurant This Menu can have multiple items

  • Method Details

    • getDish

      public static String getDish​(int index)
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the item indices from 0-50 are menu items indices from 51-60 are comb items
      Returns:
      Name of the item

    • getDescription

      public static String getDescription​(int index)
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the item
      Returns:
      Description of the item

    • getPrice

      public static float getPrice​(int index)
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the item
      Returns:
      Price of the item

    • addItem

      public static boolean addItem​(String dish, float price, String description, String category)
      Parameters:
      dish - Name of the item
      price - Price of the item
      description - Description of the item
      category - Category of the item
      Returns:
      boolean true if item was added successfully to the Menu

    • removeItem

      public static boolean removeItem​(int index)
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the item
      Returns:
      boolean true if item was removed successfully from the Menu

    • removeCombo

      public static boolean removeCombo​(int index)
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the item
      Returns:
      boolean true if combo item was removed successfully from the Menu

    • addCombo

      public static boolean addCombo​(int[] itemsIndexList, float price, int NoOfItems)
      Parameters:
      itemsIndexList - Array of indices of the items in the Menu
      price - Price of the item
      NoOfItems - Number of Items in the combo
      Returns:
      boolean true if combo item was added successfully to the Menu

    • isMenuFull

      public static boolean isMenuFull()
      Returns:
      boolean true if the Menu is full (false if it is not full)

    • isComboFull

      public static boolean isComboFull()
      Returns:
      boolean true if the Combo Menu is full (false if it is not full)

      public static void saveMenu()
      Saves the Menu in a text file

      public static void loadMenu()

    • printSalesReport

      public static void printSalesReport()
